name: Skream
description:
'''Oliver Dene Jones''' (born 1 June 1986), known professionally as '''Skream''', is an English [[electronic music]] producer based in [[Croydon]]. Skream has released records on several British record labels, such as [[Tempa]], [[Tectonic (record label)|Tectonic]], and [[Big Apple Records]], and has performed throughout Europe, the US, Canada, Australia, and Japan, as well as the UK. Skream is known as an early and influential architect of the [[dubstep]] genre.

Skream and longtime collaborators [[Magnetic Man|Artwork]] and [[Benga (musician)|Benga]] co-founded a music group called [[Magnetic Man]]. Their debut album, ''[[Magnetic Man (album)|Magnetic Man]]'' was released in 2010.

Since 2013 Skream has primarily focused on [[House music]] and [[Disco]].
